name: FComboGraphCueContainerDefinition
doc: Struct defining a list of gameplay tags, and optional source object to pass arbitrary data to GameplayCues (in GameplayCueParameters' SourceObject)

GameplayCueTags: Tags passed to the gameplay cue handler when this cue container is activated (multiple tags if matching valid gameplay cues will invoke them individually)
CueSourceObjectType:
Specify here which type of SourceObject you'd like to pass down to GameplayCues.

Allows to pass arbitrary data down to GameplayCues, made available in GameplayCueParameters' Effect Context.

Example usage: Pass down a Niagara Emitter or Cascade Particle System, or SoundCues.
NiagaraSystem: A particle system (Niagara) that if defined will be passed down to Gameplay Cues as SourceObject and available in params
CascadeSystem: A particle system (Cascade) that if defined will be passed down to Gameplay Cues as SourceObject and available in params
SoundEffect: The Sound to play (Cue, Wave, ...) that if defined will be passed down to Gameplay Cues as SourceObject and available in params
